sentence.Network_en: They spent months of toil on the water conservancy project.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们为这项水利工程辛辛苦苦地干了几个月.

sentence.Network_en: These investments have greatly improved Xinjiang's water conservancy, communications, posts and telecommunications and other infrastructure facilities.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些投资使新疆的水利 、 交通 、 邮电等基础设施环境有了很大改善.

sentence.Network_en: We've been carrying out water conservancy work on a large scale.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们进行了大规模的水利建设.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: alteration of obsolete conservacy, from Anglo-Norman French conservacie, via Anglo-Latin from Latin conservatio (see conservation)

entry.tran: 管理机构(用于环保组织的名称中)
entry.def: Conservancy is used in the names of organizations that work to preserve and protect the environment.

means.word_mean: 1. a commission with jurisdiction over fisheries and navigation in a port or river
2. the official conservation of trees and soil and rivers etc.
